attributes.review: What’s longer the list of “How Donald Trump is a Racist” or “Trumps Rape Allegations”
attributes.title: Oops

attributes.review: I wanted to support my main man trump. I love his racist, anti climate change, mysoginistic, sexist, dangerous, hateful views so I decided to download the app. It was gonna be the best day ever until my phone started shaking. A terrible ringing started and it started crashing. The app was alive in a way and destroying my phone. I had to stop it. Guys if u don’t want this happening to u, don’t download the app.save yourselves and save your phone. 😔✊
attributes.title: It’s cursed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when I opened it all the books off my shelf fell to the ground! When I started using this app I became tried and more anxious. The new foot prints on my roof keep me awake at night along side this new strange little girl in the corner who keeps crying. She disappears in the morning but I always feel her. My house used to be so quite but I’m terrified now. I had to baby proof my house to keep myself safe. But the kids who follow me around keep telling me to delete this app and not vote for orange Cheeto bunker boy. I can’t keep staying all up night. As soon as I downloaded this app my iq went down too. I can barely do multiplications now :((
attributes.title: I’m terrified! Don’t download!!!

attributes.review: Okay so I downloaded the app right because I wanted to know the latest news as a trump..supporter.And right when I opened it you had to put all your private information 🤨and it said that is gonna be safe and private so I did.Things were going well until i started receiving notifications that my information got leaked and people were buying stuff online and it told me to go on this page right and it said that I have to sell my soul and drink a chickens blood and point my phone directly to my face because they were already watching me.MORAL OF THE STORY DON’T GET THIS APP ITS A POSER.
attributes.title: 🧍🏽‍♀️in ❤️

attributes.review: WHEN I DOWNLOADED THIS APP, ROACHES STARTED CRAWLING OUT OF MY BUTT!!! 😡😡🤬🤬👺👺 DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS CURSED!!!!👺👺👺👹👹🙀🙀🙀🙀🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤬🤬🤬

I couldn’t even believe it! This app is almost as awful as the god awful Hitler reincarnate that is “leading” America!!! Absolutely do not recommend!
attributes.title: VOTE THE RAPIST OUT

attributes.review: I’m SORRY but how is this app on the App Store? I downloaded it to support our amazing Cheeto and it glitched almost instantly!!! 😭😭 it ALSO asked for my phone number!!!! AS IF I HAD ONE????!?? I’m on me mummy’s car so CLEARLY I don’t have a phone number 😔😭😭 I couldn’t even type anything or press anything bc of the glitching 👁👄👁 F*** YOU TRUMP
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I support my president and all, I feel like he’s done a lot of right to this country... but he do be asking for my phone # and social # doe 😳😳😳 *kinda sketch*. Do that shi if you want but like, I wouldn’t
